casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William BUHL. No. 82P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. Kimberly Duffley, Assistant Attorney General, Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of February 2008 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008."
